# Quoin â€¢ Styling Rules

- Primary styling via **Tailwind utility classes**; fall back to CSS Modules for edge cases.  
- Use **@apply** sparingly; avoid deep nesting.  
- Prefix custom classes with `qn-` to avoid collisions.
